participant_1.name: Lena Schmidt
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, with a passion for thrilling activities and a curiosity for different cultures.
participant_1.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all. i do like watching cooking shows. hello i just moved here from germany.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and creative, with a strong sense of community and a love for sharing music with others.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally.

content.text: as for me i like music a lot
